https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5HcJET1CNQILTrs8TvddX5JRyvg.jpg A middle-aged salaryman with a typical family, living quietly in a provincial city (Matsumoto, Nagano Prefecture), wakes up one morning in the summer of 1994 to find himself the prime suspect in the biggest mass-murder case of the decade. Darkness in the Light
